page.title: 10Burton on V.E.Day 1945
page.content: The end of the fighting in Europe was not unexpected.We knew that the war was coming to an end and so it was just a case of waiting for the official announcement.Even so when the day did come it was greeted with relief,joy and thoughts of when would loved ones in the armed forces be coming home.Everyone set about organising parties and entertainment for the children and although food was rationed and so scarce,people produced items of food which had been carefully stored away.Everyone was determined to enjoy themselves and the children's parties merged into parties for adults with singing and dancing and the streets lit up specially for the occasion.The Sheffield Arms and the Ferry House Inn were full of people celebrating.Not so one lady who heard that her son had been killed.
